title.rendered: “IDF Operations in Gaza: Targeting Terrorism and Weapons Infrastructure”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

Forces of Division 99 continue to clear the center of the Gaza Strip of weapons and terrorists; simultaneously, Division 162’s operations continue in the southern Gaza Strip.

Division 162 continues focused activities based on intelligence in the Rafah area. Forces from the combat teams of Brigades 401, Nahal, Givati, and 12 identified weapons, as well as tunnels and underground infrastructure, in the area over the last 24 hours. In one of the operations, Givati Brigade fighters eliminated a terrorist cell identified operating nearby, posing a threat to them.

During the last 24 hours, forces of Division 99 continued to operate to clear the center of the Gaza Strip of terrorist infrastructure, weapons, and armed terrorist cells. In this context, fighters from the multidimensional unit eliminated terrorists during close-quarters combat using sniper fire and drones.

Throughout the last day, aircraft and fighter jets of the Air Force attacked dozens of terrorist targets across the Gaza Strip, including terrorist infrastructures, terrorists, and military buildings.

Attached are photos from the forces’ activities: https://IDFANC.activetrail.biz/ANC230620248298948

Attached is documentation from IDF strikes in the Gaza Strip: https://bit.ly/4csRrWY
